translation_en: The Prophet frowned and turned away
translation_id: Dia (Nabi Muhammad) berwajah masam dan berpaling

translation_en: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
translation_id: karena seorang tunanetra (Abdullah bin Ummi Maktum) telah datang kepadanya.

transliteration_en: Wa maa yudreeka la'allahu yaz zakkaa.
translation_en: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
translation_id: Tahukah engkau (Nabi Muhammad) boleh jadi dia ingin menyucikan dirinya (dari dosa)

transliteration_en: Au yaz zak karu fatanfa 'ahuz zikraa.
translation_en: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
translation_id: atau dia (ingin) mendapatkan pengajaran sehingga pengajaran itu bermanfaat baginya?

translation_en: As for he who thinks himself without need,
translation_id: Adapun orang yang merasa dirinya serba cukup (para pembesar Quraisy),

translation_en: To him you give attention.
translation_id: engkau (Nabi Muhammad) memberi perhatian kepadanya.

translation_en: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
translation_id: Padahal, tidak ada (cela) atasmu kalau dia tidak menyucikan diri (beriman).

translation_en: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
translation_id: Adapun orang yang datang kepadamu dengan bersegera (untuk mendapatkan pengajaran),

translation_en: While he fears [Allah],
translation_id: sedangkan dia takut (kepada Allah),

translation_en: From him you are distracted.
translation_id: malah engkau (Nabi Muhammad) abaikan.

translation_en: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
translation_id: Sekali-kali jangan (begitu)! Sesungguhnya (ajaran Allah) itu merupakan peringatan.

translation_en: So whoever wills may remember it.
translation_id: Siapa yang menghendaki tentulah akan memperhatikannya

translation_en: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
translation_id: di dalam suhuf yang dimuliakan (di sisi Allah),

translation_en: Exalted and purified,
translation_id: yang ditinggikan (kedudukannya) lagi disucikan

translation_en: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
translation_id: di tangan para utusan (malaikat)

translation_en: Noble and dutiful.
translation_id: yang mulia lagi berbudi.

translation_en: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
translation_id: Celakalah manusia! Alangkah kufur dia!

translation_en: From what substance did He create him?
translation_id: Dari apakah Dia menciptakannya?

translation_en: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
translation_id: Dia menciptakannya dari setetes mani, lalu menentukan (takdir)-nya.

translation_en: Then He eased the way for him;
translation_id: Kemudian, jalannya Dia mudahkan.

translation_en: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
translation_id: Kemudian, Dia mematikannya lalu menguburkannya.

translation_en: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
translation_id: Kemudian, jika menghendaki, Dia membangkitkannya kembali.

translation_en: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
translation_id: Sekali-kali jangan (begitu)! Dia (manusia) itu belum melaksanakan apa yang Dia (Allah) perintahkan kepadanya.

translation_en: Then let mankind look at his food -
translation_id: Maka, hendaklah manusia itu memperhatikan makanannya.

translation_en: How We poured down water in torrents,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mencurahkan air (dari langit) dengan berlimpah.

translation_en: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
translation_id: Kemudian, Kami belah bumi dengan sebaik-baiknya.

translation_en: And caused to grow within it grain
translation_id: Lalu, Kami tumbuhkan padanya biji-bijian,

translation_en: And grapes and herbage
translation_id: anggur, sayur-sayuran,

translation_en: And olive and palm trees
translation_id: zaitun, pohon kurma,

translation_en: And gardens of dense shrubbery
translation_id: kebun-kebun (yang) rindang,

translation_en: And fruit and grass -
translation_id: buah-buahan, dan rerumputan.

translation_en: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
translation_id: (Semua itu disediakan) untuk kesenanganmu dan hewan-hewan ternakmu.

translation_en: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
translation_id: Maka, apabila datang suara yang memekakkan (dari tiupan sangkakala),

translation_en: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
translation_id: pada hari itu manusia lari dari saudaranya,

translation_en: And his mother and his father
translation_id: (dari) ibu dan bapaknya,

translation_en: And his wife and his children,
translation_id: serta (dari) istri dan anak-anaknya.

arabic: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ شَأْنٌ يُّغْنِيْهِۗ
translation_en: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
translation_id: Setiap orang dari mereka pada hari itu mempunyai urusan yang menyibukkannya.

translation_en: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
translation_id: Pada hari itu ada wajah-wajah yang berseri-seri,

translation_en: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
translation_id: tertawa lagi gembira ria.

translation_en: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
translation_id: Pada hari itu ada (pula) wajah-wajah yang tertutup debu (suram)

translation_en: Blackness will cover them.
translation_id: dan tertutup oleh kegelapan (ditimpa kehinaan dan kesusahan).

translation_en: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
translation_id: Mereka itulah orang-orang kafir lagi para pendurhaka.
